reviewText: This is such a great video explaining the who, what, when, where, how and why Angelic Riders exists.  The farm is a great place to volunteer and ride at, I miss being around to help and this makes me feel like I am there!

I was looking for a video that would help inspire people to go into the field of volunteering at a different therapeutic horseback riding center. I was hoping they would go into more detail about how the horseback riding helped the children with different disabilities and some of the techniques used. It was more about one particular horse riding center. It did have some inspiring information though, just not exactly what I was looking for.
